scan_table_check.description: All menu modules must at least require one user role to control access or the module's application menu must require at least one role. The snc_internal role does not count.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Modules must require a role
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Add a role to the module - ideally a role that is defined in the same application - or add a required role to the application menu.
scan_table_check.short_description: A menu module must require at least one role.
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - Modules must require a role
